name: ROOS (Jack Goddard)
description:
Roos has died, he now finds himself before the gates of Paradise, but they've run out of space.

The gatekeeper is willing to take a bribe, the return of something lost from the creature that roams purgatory. With no other choices, Roos agrees and sets off to defeat the Soar of the Oasis.

A short action dark fantasy made in seven days for the Epic Games Unreal Megajam 2021 with the theme "Running out of Space".

Voices performed by Jack Goddard.

You can find me and my other projects on Twitter and Instagram: @ActuallyGoddard

Let me know if you'd like to see more of Roos!
